QuestData.Title: Gurtar's Request
QuestData.Description: I have a bit of a personal request for you, $c.$b$bIt has been many moons since I have seen my love, Draaka. It will be many more before we are able to be together again. I fear that as time passes, her love for me will wane.$b$bThis braid has special meaning to the two of us, as do Thorned Bloodcups, the flower of this region.$b$bI ask that you pluck the flowers and weave them into this twine, then present the gift to Draaka on my behalf.
QuestData.LogDescription: Guardian Gurtar wants you to give the Bloodcup Braid to Draaka in Splintertree.
QuestData.RewardText: <Recognizing at once the nature of the gift, Draaka begins to weep.>$b$bOh, $n. Thank you for this gift! It means more than you could know.$b$bHe hasn't forgotten...
